content.en: Educational algorithmics: Algorithms play a crucial role in improving teaching and learning in vocational education. They are used to model learning resources and services, reason from experiences, develop search algorithms, enhance comprehension of learned material, transform resources into concept maps and ontologies, enable knowledge acquisition and reuse, build ontologies, assist in e-learning design practices, engineer domain ontologies, model learning processes and disciplines, customize the e-learning process, support assessment in e-learning courses, enhance information sharing and search in e-learning management systems, automate the selection of learning resources, organize and classify learning resources, improve the e-assessment process, enhance educational system development, improve adaptive educational environments, enhance evaluation and development of educational systems, and enhance predictive analytics in e-learning.
content.da: Uddannelsesalgoritmer: Algoritmer spiller en afgørende rolle i at forbedre undervisningen og læringen inden for erhvervsuddannelse. De bruges til at modellere læringsressourcer og -tjenester, ræsonnere ud fra erfaringer, udvikle søgealgoritmer, forbedre forståelsen af lært materiale, transformere ressourcer til begrebskort og ontologier, muliggøre vidensopnåelse og -genbrug, bygge ontologier, assistere i designpraksis inden for e-læring, udvikle fagontologier, modellere læringsprocesser og discipliner, tilpasse e-læringsprocessen, understøtte vurdering i e-læringskurser, forbedre informationsdeling og søgning i e-læringsstyringssystemer, automatisere udvælgelsen af læringsressourcer, organisere og klassificere læringsressourcer, forbedre e-vurderingsprocessen, forbedre udviklingen af uddannelsessystemer, forbedre adaptive læringsmiljøer, forbedre evaluering og udvikling af uddannelsessystemer samt forbedre prædiktiv analyse i e-læring.
